verbose_text: We identified high expression of the voltage gated sodium channel Na v 1.3, as well as P/Q-, L-, and T-type Ca 2+ channels; this is consistent with previous murine data, and with the finding that GLP-1 release from human intestinal biopsies was blocked by the L-type Ca 2+ -channel-inhibitor nifedipine.
evidence: GLP-1 release from human intestinal biopsies was blocked by the L-type Ca
